verses.verse: Now after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Joshua <WH3091> it came <WH1961> to pass, that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> asked <WH7592> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Who <WH4310> shall go <WH5927> up for us against the Canaanites <WH3669> first, <WH8462> to fight <WH3898> against them?
And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Judah <WH3063> shall go <WH5927> up: behold, <WH2009> I have delivered <WH5414> the land <WH776> into his hand. <WH3027>

And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> to Simeon <WH8095> his brother, <WH251> Come <WH5927> up with me into my lot, <WH1486> that we may fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites; <WH3669> and I likewise <WH1571> will go <WH1980> with you into your lot. <WH1486> So Simeon <WH8095> went <WH3212> with him.

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH5927> up; and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522> into their hand: <WH3027> and they slew <WH5221> of them in Bezek <WH966> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men. <WH376>
And they found <WH4672> Adonibezek <WH137> in Bezek: <WH966> and they fought <WH3898> against him, and they slew <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites. <WH6522>
But Adonibezek <WH137> fled; <WH5127> and they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> him, and caught <WH270> him, and cut <WH7112> off his thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and his great toes. <WH931> <WH7272>

And Adonibezek <WH137> said, <WH559> Three score <WH7657> and ten kings, <WH4428> having their thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and their great toes <WH931> <WH7272> cut <WH7112> off, gathered <WH3950> their meat under <WH8478> my table: <WH7979> as I have done, <WH6213> so <WH3651> God <WH430> has requited <WH7999> me. And they brought <WH935> him to Jerusalem, <WH3389> and there <WH8033> he died. <WH4191>

Now the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> had fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem, <WH3389> and had taken <WH3920> it, and smitten <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and set <WH7971> the city <WH5892> on fire. <WH784>

And afterward <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites, <WH3669> that dwelled <WH3427> in the mountain, <WH2022> and in the south, <WH5045> and in the valley. <WH8219>

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> against <WH413> the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelled <WH3427> in Hebron: <WH2275> (now the name <WH8034> of Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> was Kirjatharba: <WH7153>) and they slew <WH5221> Sheshai, <WH8344> and Ahiman, <WH289> and Talmai. <WH8526>
And from there <WH8033> he went <WH3212> against <WH413> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir: <WH1688> and the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> before <WH6440> was Kirjathsepher: <WH7158>
And Caleb <WH3612> said, <WH559> He that smites <WH5221> Kirjathsepher, <WH7158> and takes <WH3920> it, to him will I give <WH5414> Achsah <WH5919> my daughter <WH1323> to wife. <WH802>

And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz, <WH7073> Caleb's <WH3612> younger <WH6996> brother, <WH251> took <WH3920> it: and he gave <WH5414> him Achsah <WH5919> his daughter <WH1323> to wife. <WH802>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when she came <WH935> to him, that she moved <WH5496> him to ask <WH7592> of her father <WH1> a field: <WH7704> and she lighted <WH6795> from off <WH5921> her ass; <WH2543> and Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559> to her, What <WH4100> will you?

And she said <WH559> to him, Give <WH3051> me a blessing: <WH1293> for you have given <WH5414> me a south <WH5045> land; <WH776> give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water. <WH4325> And Caleb <WH3612> gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the nether <WH8482> springs. <WH1543>

And the children <WH1121> of the Kenite, <WH7017> Moses' <WH4872> father <WH2859> in law, <WH2859> went <WH5927> up out of the city <WH5892> of palm <WH8558> trees with the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah, <WH3063> which <WH834> lies in the south <WH5045> of Arad; <WH6166> and they went <WH3212> and dwelled <WH3427> among <WH854> the people. <WH5971>

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> with Simeon <WH8095> his brother, <WH251> and they slew <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> that inhabited <WH3427> Zephath, <WH6857> and utterly destroyed <WH2763> it. And the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> Hormah. <WH2767>
Also Judah <WH3063> took <WH3920> Gaza <WH5804> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Askelon <WH831> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Ekron <WH6138> with the coast <WH1366> thereof.

And the LORD <WH3068> was with Judah; <WH3063> and he drove <WH3423> out the inhabitants of the mountain; <WH2022> but could not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of the valley, <WH6010> because <WH3588> they had chariots <WH7393> of iron. <WH1270>
And they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> to Caleb, <WH3612> as Moses <WH4872> said: <WH1696> and he expelled <WH3423> there <WH8033> the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak. <WH6061>

And the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> did not drive <WH3423> out the Jebusites <WH2983> that inhabited <WH3427> Jerusalem; <WH3389> but the Jebusites <WH2983> dwell <WH3427> with the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> in Jerusalem <WH3389> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> they also <WH1571> went <WH5927> up against Bethel: <WH1008> and the LORD <WH3068> was with them.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> sent <WH7971> to descry <WH8446> Bethel. <WH1008> (Now the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> before <WH6440> was Luz. <WH3870>)

And the spies <WH8104> saw <WH7200> a man <WH376> come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of the city, <WH5892> and they said <WH559> to him, Show <WH7200> us, we pray <WH4994> you, the entrance <WH3996> into the city, <WH5892> and we will show <WH6213> you mercy. <WH2617>

And when he showed <WH7200> them the entrance <WH3996> into the city, <WH5892> they smote <WH5221> the city <WH5892> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword; <WH2719> but they let go <WH7971> the man <WH376> and all <WH3605> his family. <WH4940>

And the man <WH376> went <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of the Hittites, <WH2850> and built <WH1129> a city, <WH5892> and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> thereof Luz: <WH3870> which <WH1931> is the name <WH8034> thereof to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Neither <WH3808> did Manasseh <WH4519> drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants of Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns, <WH1323> nor Taanach <WH8590> and her towns, <WH1323> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and her towns, <WH1323> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Ibleam <WH2991> and her towns, <WH1323> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns: <WH1323> but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land. <WH776>
And it came <WH1961> to pass, when Israel <WH3478> was strong, <WH2388> that they put <WH7760> the Canaanites <WH3669> to tribute, <WH4522> and did not utterly drive <WH3423> them out.

Neither <WH3808> did Ephraim <WH669> drive <WH3423> out the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelled <WH3427> in Gezer; <WH1507> but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelled <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507> among <WH7130> them.

Neither <WH3808> did Zebulun <WH2074> drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kitron, <WH7003> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Nahalol; <WH5096> but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelled <WH3427> among <WH7130> them, and became <WH1961> tributaries. <WH4522>

Neither <WH3808> did Asher <WH836> drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Accho, <WH5910> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Zidon, <WH6721> nor of Ahlab, <WH303> nor of Achzib, <WH392> nor of Helbah, <WH2462> nor of Aphik, <WH663> nor of Rehob: <WH7340>
But the Asherites <WH843> dwelled <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites, <WH3669> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land: <WH776> for they did not drive <WH3423> them out.

Neither <WH3808> did Naphtali <WH5321> drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethshemesh, <WH1053> nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethanath; <WH1043> but he dwelled <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites, <WH3669> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land: <WH776> nevertheless the inhabitants <WH3427> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> and of Bethanath <WH1043> became <WH1961> tributaries <WH4522> to them.

And the Amorites <WH567> forced <WH3905> the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> into the mountain: <WH2022> for they would not suffer <WH5414> them to come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the valley: <WH6010>

But the Amorites <WH567> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in mount <WH2022> Heres <WH2776> in Aijalon, <WH357> and in Shaalbim: <WH8169> yet the hand <WH3027> of the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> prevailed, <WH3513> so that they became <WH1961> tributaries. <WH4522>
And the coast <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567> was from the going <WH4608> up to Akrabbim, <WH6137> from the rock, <WH5553> and upward. <WH4605>
